summary: Director of Public Relations and Communications professional with extensive experience in healthcare marketing, community relations, collateral design, and media relations across academic institutions and health plans. Skilled in budget oversight, cross-state program management, and development of communications strategies and educational programs.

experience.title: Director of Public Relations
experience.description: Created and leveraged 'Success Stories' from LifeShare programs for business development; oversaw marketing department and conference budgets; coordinated cross-state information exchange; collaborated with LifeShare offices and partners to meet marketing needs.

experience.title: Director of Public Relations
experience.description: College spokesperson and liaison to media; ensured major publications and communications supported strategic efforts to strengthen the college's competitive position.

experience.title: Director of Communications
experience.description: Partnered with internal clients to implement solutions to improve communication strategies; planned and managed communication vehicles to promote and drive organizational priorities.

experience.title: Director of Public Relations and Publications
experience.description: Directed and developed alumni magazine, annual report, newsletters, invitations, fundraising materials; ensured print collateral reflected school programs and achievements across channels; built relationships with external media.

experience.title: Journalist
experience.description: Reported on political and community news for four towns and two school boards; authored over 1,200 by-lined articles; recognized by NH Press Association for writing.

experience.title: Administrator PROFESSIONAL
experience.description: Managed and oversaw 24-hour operations; administered regulatory-compliant program.

experience.title: Registered Nurse
experience.description: Provided marketing solutions for B2B sales organization, including sales management, marketing, presentations, and social media; supported branding and promotional campaigns; health assessments, medications administration, and wellness observations.

experience.title: Marketing and Communications
experience.description: Provide communications and marketing solutions to meet annual and strategic goals; engage in press relations, presentations, marketing, and social media to support Lifeshare/Centene initiatives.
